## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G07170](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G07170)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>IRP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** INVOLVED IN rRNA PROCESSING 1
- **Description:**   Sterile alpha motif (SAM) domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2098550
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
